155312.content:
(This takes place after the second movies events,also can someone please add to this)
The Incredibles Received Word That a dangerous new villain SwitchaLulu has broke into a Local Museum that was closed off to the public due to accidentally obtaining a dangerous power source meant for the government ,The Purple Diamond Necklace,Said to amplify any superhero or supervillans powers when wearing it,Jack Jack was left home while the 4 went off to stop her..
Ahhh as Bob busted the door open
Your lucky the government gave us permission to investigate the building or we would be paying for that door Said Helen rolling her eyes come on kids,coast is clear
So what makes this villain so dangerous Said dash running around the museum
The government has a very hard time tracking her since her power let’s Her Switch Bodies with People and swap the bodies of others explained Helen
That doesn’t exist mom said violet reappearing from being invisible,it only exists in cheesy films involving fortune cookies and selfless love getting a smirk as she looked off into the distance
Is that so Said a voice in the distance as she appeared to be a guard dragging her original body behind her
Wow you caught her Said dash
No idiot,as her female voice coming out of the male guard
You must be SwitchaLulu Said Bob as he saw her swap back into her original self
Yes I am,for years I went in hiding and I was a big fan of your work Incredibles,Syndrome,Underminer,That bed head woman I didn’t catch her name you caught recently,but enough fan girling,I need this necklace for the reason,whoever I swap or swap with,they keep thier original voices,which is a total giveaway also I can only swap what’s directly in front of me,and with the necklace I can swap the entire world and cause total chaos....
Not on our watch Said Helen as The Incredibles rushed to attack her
But as soon as they came close she pulled a swap trick before getting away,realizing she has no chance of getting the necklace right now,what type of swap happened before she got away?

info.brief_description: I saw the sequel to The Incredibles, which made me want to write this.
info.description:
This is an Interactive based on the movie The Incredibles. You can add anything you want as long as the story makes sense, with the exceptions of these rules.

1.) Don't kill anyone off.

2.) Drastic changes (such as turning out to be evil, divorcing, quitting their jobs, etc) are fine for OCs, but don't do it with canon characters.

3.) No swearing.

4.) No time skips that last a year or more or stories set in the future, although stories set in the past are fine.

5.) No illness, serious injuries or sleep deprivation but characters who are introduced as being disabled is fine.

6.) Canon characters changing somehow (losing their powers, turning into animals, etc) is allowed, as long as they eventually return to normal. This includes getting fat. I add this because some writers seem to like making characters fat. If that does happen, again, make it temporary, and remember that food doesn't cause instant fatness.

7.) A bit of romance is fine, but no explicit sex, bestiality, incest, pedophilia, vore, etc.

8.) Keep everyone in-character.

9.) No drugs.

10.) A bit of potty humour is fine as long as it's not excessive.
